promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic scorpion grass-type pokemon with green and brown wings. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or scorpion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdanthorn, a a young basic scorpion grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Leaf Blast. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "scorpion", "grass" or "Verdanthorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, scorpion-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Known for using Leaf Blast, this lively critter thrives in woodland environs. It's often seen sunbathing on tree trunks or navigating forest floors.
